description: Composite numbers n such that digits of prime factors of n are either 1 or 8.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..58
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [4..1500000] | not IsPrime(n) and forall{f: f in PrimeDivisors(n) | Intseq(f) subset [1,8]}]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Aug 26 2013
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Dec 15 1998.
